feature_model.name: F1
feature_model.feature_tree: :r F1 (F1) :m root (root) :o F10 (F10) :o F3 (F3) :o F5 (F5) :o F4 (F4) :o F7 (F7) :o F2 (F2) :o F6 (F6) :o F9 (F9) :o F8 (F8)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~F6 or ~F5 constraint_2:~F2 or ~F5 constraint_3:~F7 or ~F5 constraint_4:~F5 or ~F9 constraint_5:~F5 or ~F8 constraint_6:~F5 or ~F4
